Jump Style.tooltip: Charge: you have to hold space to charge a jump and release space to perform the jump. Instant: you will jump immediately upon pressing space. Vanilla: Charge

Enable Sprinting.tooltip: Allows you to sprint. Recommended: Enabled

Sprint Button.tooltip: Whether sprinting uses the Up Thrust button (usually shift or right trigger) or the Down Thrust button (usually control or left trigger). Recommended: Up Thrust.

Enable Midair Turning.tooltip: Allows you to change direction and/or slow down in midair, even without your jetpack. Recommended: Enabled

Enable Stamina.tooltip: Sprinting will use up stamina, so you won't be able to sprint forever and will have to let your stamina replenish. Recommended: Disabled

Enable Emergency Boost.tooltip: Allows you to shoot up into the air by pressing space twice. Recommended: Disabled

Enable Floaty Physics.tooltip: Lowers your acceleration in low gravity, making movement floatier. Recommended: Disabled

Enable Wall Jumping.tooltip: Allows you to climb up walls by jumping off of them. Recommended: Disabled

Normal Speed.tooltip: How quickly you move normally. Vanilla: 6

Strafe Speed.tooltip: How quickly you move when walking backwards or to the side. Vanilla: 4

Walk Speed.tooltip: How quickly you move when holding the walk (roll mode) button. Vanilla: 3

Focused Lantern Speed.tooltip: How quickly you move while focusing a lantern. Vanilla: 2

Ground Acceleration.tooltip: How quickly you reach your maximum speed. Vanilla: 0.5

Minimum Jump Power.tooltip: The power of your jump when it isn't charged. Vanilla: 3

Maximum Jump Power.tooltip: The power of your jump when it is fully charged. Vanilla: 7

Air Speed.tooltip: How quickly you can move in midair. Vanilla: 3

Air Acceleration.tooltip: How quickly you reach your maximum speed while in midair. Vanilla: 0.09

Jetpack Acceleration.tooltip: How powerful your jetpack is. Vanilla: 6

Jetpack Boost Acceleration.tooltip: How powerful your jetpack is while boosting. Vanilla: 23

Max Jetpack Boost Time.tooltip: How long you can use your jetpack boost, in seconds. Vanilla: 1

Max Jetpack Fuel Amount.tooltip: The amount of fuel your jetpack can hold at full capacity. Vanilla: 100

SprintMultiplier.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
SprintMultiplier.tooltip: How much your speed is multiplied while sprinting. Recommended: 1.75

Start Sprinting On Landing.tooltip: If you're holding the sprint button and a directional input when you land on the ground, you will stop thrusting and start sprinting. Recommended: Enabled

Show Thruster Effect while Sprinting.tooltip: Makes your jetpack thrusters fire as you sprint, as if they're boosting you. No gameplay effect. Recommended: Disabled

Seconds of Stamina.tooltip: The amount of time you can sprint before running out of stamina. Recommended: 10

Stamina Recovery Rate.tooltip: The amount of seconds of stamina you regain every second. Recommended: 1

Emergency Boost Power.tooltip: How powerful an emergency boost is. Recommended: 15

Emergency Boost Cost.tooltip: The amount of fuel an emergency boost uses. Recommended: 30

Emergency Boost Volume.tooltip: How loud the emergency boost sound is compared to the default volume. Recommended: 1

Emergency Boost Input Time.tooltip: The maximum amount of time in seconds between jump inputs that will trigger an emergency boost. Recommended: 0.25

Emergency Boost Camera Shake Amount.tooltip: How much the camera shakes when doing an emergency boost. Only works if Camera Shake mod is installed and enabled. Recommended: 1

Floaty Physics Power.tooltip: The higher this number is, the faster you'll notice your acceleration decreasing as gravity decreases. Recommended: 1

Floaty Physics Minimum Acceleration.tooltip: The minimum acceleration that can take effect with floaty physics. Recommended: 0.25

Floaty Physics Minimum Gravity.tooltip: The gravity below which floaty physics will start to take effect. Recommended: 1

Minimum Gravity.tooltip: The gravity at which the minimum acceleration will take effect. Recommended: 0.5

Maximum Number of Wall Jumps.tooltip: How many times you can Wall Jump without touching the ground. Recommended: 5
